alerts.description: Product: Last Time Buy Date is approaching.
Product: Missing documents required for ES gate
Products: Product Status mismatches the gate dates.

fieldUpdates.description: Transfer Product Text Long to Product Description Changed from the following formula (on Aug 07 2013): Product_Text_1__c &" "& Product_Text_2__c
fieldUpdates.name: Product Text to Description

fieldUpdates.description: Assign to Peter Fairhurst. Stephane Vincent is deactivated.
fieldUpdates.name: Product: Product Owner to :svin:

rules.description: Status of product changed to End-of-Life
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Product_Status__c) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c, "End of Life") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product_Category__c, "Internal Use Only")) && NOT(TEXT(Product_Category__c)="")

rules.description: Status of product changed to Engineering Samples
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Product_Status__c) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c, "Engineering Samples") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product_Category__c, "Internal Use Only")) && NOT(TEXT(Product_Category__c)="")

rules.description: Status of product changed to Initial Production
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Product_Status__c) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c, "Initial Production") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product_Category__c, "Internal Use Only")) && NOT(TEXT(Product_Category__c)="")

rules.description: Status of product changed to Mass Production
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Product_Status__c) && ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c, "Mass Production") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product_Category__c, "Internal Use Only")) && NOT(TEXT(Product_Category__c)="")

rules.description: Status of product changed to Obsolete
Status of product changed to Prototypes
Inform PS POS when a new product has been created in Abacus
Inform PS CEL when a new product has been created in Abacus
Add 3% to Logistics Overhead if Use Abacus Cost is set and Logistics Overhead is empty.
Email alert when COGS 1 is added
Update when Comment has been updated
Fill the date when the IPR Checked has been checked.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Fill IPR USD Pct fields
rules.description: This workflow is required to fill IPR USD Pct fields in case IPR Cost field is changed in Product.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Last Time Buy Date is approaching
rules.description: Notification that Last Time Buy Date is approaching.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Missing documents required for ES Gate
rules.description: Send an email alert if one of document availability fields are missing or later than ES.
rules.formula: Visible_In_Masterschedule__c = true && TEXT(Product_Category__c) <> "Support tools" && (ISBLANK(PS_Availability_Date__c) || (PS_Availability_Date__c > ES_Availability_Date__c) || ISBLANK(DS_Availability_Date__c) || (DS_Availability_Date__c > ES_Availability_Date__c) || ISBLANK(Manual_Availability_Date__c) || (Manual_Availability_Date__c > ES_Availability_Date__c)) && ((TEXT(Product_Status__c) = "In Development") || (TEXT(Product_Status__c) = "Prototypes") || (TEXT(Product_Status__c) = "Engineering Samples")) && (ISCHANGED(ES_Availability_Date__c) || ISCHANGED(Product_Status__c))

rules.fullName: Product%3A Notify shop product to EOL
rules.description: Send email alert
rules.formula: AND( Shop_Active__c, ISCHANGED(Product_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Product_Status__c, "End of Life") )

rules.description: Product Owner update to :este: (WCDMA, LTE(XXXX-L2 series))
Product Owner update to :cstu: (LTE(except XXXX-L2 series))
Product Owner update to :svin: (GNSS modules except PPP, Timing, antenna modules)

rules.fullName: Product%3A Product Status mismatch the gate dates
rules.booleanFilter: 1 and 2 and ((3 and 4 and 5) or (6 and 7 and 8) or (9 and 10 and 11) or (12 and 13 and 14) or (15 and 16 and 17) or (18 and 19))
rules.description: Notification when one of the gate dates have passed but Product Status has not been changed yet.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Product Status mismatch the gate dates %28EOL%2FPCN Issue Date passed%29
rules.description: Notification that Product Status is not End Of Life.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Product Status mismatch the gate dates %28ES Availability Date passed%29

criteriaItems.value: Engineering Samples,Initial Production,Mass Production,End of Life,Obsolete

rules.description: Notification that Product Status is not Engineering Sample.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Product Status mismatch the gate dates %28IP Availability Date passed%29
rules.description: Notification that Product Status is not Initial Production.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Product Status mismatch the gate dates %28Last Shipment Date passed%29
rules.description: Notification that Product Status is not Obsolete.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Product Status mismatch the gate dates %28MP Availability Date passed%29
rules.description: Notification that Product Status is not Mass Production.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Product Status mismatch the gate dates %28PT Availability Date passed%29

criteriaItems.value: Prototypes,Engineering Samples,Initial Production,Mass Production,End of Life,Obsolete

rules.description: Notification that Product Status is not Prototype.

rules.fullName: Product%3A Set visibility checkboxes to FALSE
rules.description: When Product Status is Obsolete, Active, Visible In Masterschedule and Visible To Partner will be FALSE.
Uncheck the flag whenever IPR changes to ask for control.
Inform PS SHO when a new product has been created in Abacus
Send email alert to product owner
Send email alert to product owner
